moves.1. d4: This is my first annotated game. I hope you'll enjoy it. Let's start with my favourite opening to d4.
moves.1... Nf6 2. c4: There's much space. I'll try to conquer the center
moves.2... e6 3. Nc3 Bb4 4. Bd2 O-O 5. f3: Still trying to put pressure on d/e 4/5, but I didn't recognize Qh4+
There's the queen. Bad move of mine, but i can still improve my position at cost of one pawn
moves.10. Kd1 Qxe4 11. Nf3 h6 12. Bd3: Starting to attack black's King side
moves.12... Qc6 13. Kc2 Nd7 14. b3: Unlocking the rook on a1 because of Qa4+
moves.16... c6: Now I'll try to attack the king with my free pawns on lines g and h
moves.17. h3 Qc7 18. g4 g6 19. Qxh6: I take that gift, because I can't see a trap
moves.20... Qe7: Continuing to move forward with my pawns. Black's defend is very weak
moves.21. h4 Kg7 22. h5 Rh8 23. h6+ Kf8: At this point I decided to attack g6 with my knight to fork at least two of black's figures (queen, rook, king).
moves.24. g5: chasing away black's knights to conquer h4
moves.24... Nd7 25. Bxg6: I decided to sacrifize my rook to attack f7 three time, still focusing on g6 with my knight
moves.27... Be8 28. Ng6#: I didn't expect it to end so much, but that's it
